title: Whisper
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-distil-whisper
  build: pip install dora-distil-whisper
  path: dora-distil-whisper
  inputs: 
    tick: <NODE>/audio
  outputs: 
    - text

title: Qwenvl
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-qwenvl
  build: pip install dora-qwenvl
  path: dora-qwenvl
  inputs: 
    text: <NODE>/text
    image: <NODE>/image
  outputs: 
    - text

title: Silero VAD
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-vad
  build: pip install dora-vad
  path: dora-vad
  inputs: 
    tick: <NODE>/audio
  outputs: 
    - audio

title: Microphone
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-microphone
  build: pip install dora-microphone
  path: dora-microphone
  inputs: 
    tick: dora/timer/millis/50
  outputs: 
    - audio

title: Rerun
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-rerun
  build: pip install dora-rerun
  path: dora-rerun
  inputs: 
    image: <NODE>/image
    text: <NODE>/text

title: Video Capture
author: dora
install:
- id: opencv-video-capture
  build: pip install opencv-video-capture
  path: opencv-video-capture
  inputs: 
    tick: dora/timer/millis/50
  outputs: 
    - image

title: Yolov8
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-yolo
  build: pip install dora-yolo
  path: dora-yolo
  inputs: 
    image: <NODE>/image
  outputs: 
    - bbox

title: Plot
author: dora
install:
- id: opencv-plot
  build: pip install opencv-plot
  path: opencv-plot
  inputs: 
    image: <NODE>/image
    text: <NODE>/text

title: PyRealsense
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-pyrealsense
  build: pip install dora-pyrealsense
  path: dora-pyrealsense
  inputs: 
    tick: dora/timer/millis/50
  outputs: 
    - image
    - depth

title: PyOrbbeckSDK
description: Image and depth from Orbbeck Camera
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-pyorbbecksdk
  build: pip install dora-pyorbbecksdk
  path: dora-pyorbbecksdk
  inputs: 
    tick: dora/timer/millis/50
  outputs: 
    - image
    - depth
    - image_depth

title: Keyboard
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-keyboard
  build: pip install dora-keyboard
  path: dora-keyboard
  inputs: 
    tick: dora/timer/millis/1000
  outputs: 
    - char

title: Agilex Piper
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-piper
  build: pip install dora-piper
  path: dora-keyboard
  inputs: 
    tick: dora/timer/millis/20
    joint_action: <NODE>/jointstate
  outputs: 
    - jointstate

title: Opus MT
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-opus
  build: pip install dora-opus
  path: dora-opus
  inputs: 
    text: <NODE>/text
  outputs: 
    - text
  env:
    SOURCE_LANGUAGE: en
    TARGET_LANGUAGE: fr

title: Llama Factory Recorder
description: Record data to train LLM and VLM
author: dora
install:
- id: llama-factory-recorder
  build: pip install llama-factory-recorder
  path: llama-factory-recorder
  inputs: 
    image: <NODE>/image
    text: <NODE>/text
    ground_truth: <NODE>/text
  outputs: 
    - text

title: RDT-1B
description: Infer policy using Robotic Diffusion Transformer
author: dora
install:
- id: dora-rdt-1b
  build: pip install dora-rdt-1b
  path: dora-rdt-1b
  inputs: 
    image: <NODE>/image
    jointstate: <NODE>/jointstate
  outputs: 
    - action
